duties_responsibilities.duty: Contribute to building, testing, deploying, and operating highly scalable solutions for the canonical asset management system for a Cloud Infrastructure.
Work independently and as part of a team in an Agile environment, managing multiple projects and priorities in a fast-paced setting.
Be a great communicator to both technical and non-technical stakeholders in multiple locations around the globe.
Troubleshoot, debug, and performance tune system components and integrations.
Design and develop solutions with containerization technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes, and work with observability tools and practices.

education_certification.credential: BS or MS degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience (US Citizens able to obtain a security clearance)
